name: Fa\u00ebria - Strategy Card Game
blurb: Tradable cards meet board games and strategy in a fresh experience: shape the battlefield, collect resources and destroy your opponent!

rewards.reward: No Reward

THE FOLLOWER\r\n==============================\r\nYour username will be reserved for the release. You will also receive our heartfelt thanks for your support, each dollar will make Fa\u00ebria a better game!

THE INQUISITIVE\r\n============================== ENTER THE CLOSED BETA NOW: You're one click away from playing Fa\u00ebria, keys are delivered within 24 hours from the moment you pledge. There will be no account wipe when the game gets released. You will also have access to the KICKSTARTER TOURNAMENT - prizes include higher pledge tiers and SteelSeries peripherals, more information on the page. Plus THE FOLLOWER's reward.

THE FELLOW ============================== You will receive Fa\u00ebria's release version. Additionally, you will receive a Kickstarter Exclusive wallpaper to thank you for your trust. All previous tiers included.

THE FORTUNE HUNTER\r\n==============================\r\nKickstarter Exclusive avatar: The Fortune Hunter avatar will ornement your account's emblem, visible everywhere on the game (Chat room, during PvP, etc). In addition, you will receive a DRM free copy of Fa\u00ebria's digital soundtrack and a DRM free copy of the digital artbook. All previous tiers included.

THE FAVOURITE\r\n==============================\r\n4 Kickstarter Exclusive cards: Burning Coals (red), Triton Hussar (blue), Gaea's Dream (green) and Solar Mirror (yellow). Each of these cards features an exclusive gameplay mechanic. They are tradable and legal only for unranked play and special events like the Kickstarter tournaments. All previous tiers included.

THE EXPLORER\r\n==============================\r\nYou will have access to the private test server where the developers and their enforcers test the new cards, new expansions and upcoming features. You will also have access to the forum's private section where the upcoming cards and expansions are discussed. In addition, you will receive the Kickstarter Exclusive emblem (account plaque, visible in chatroom and in-game). All previous tiers included.
THE BOUNTIFUL ============================== You will receive one additional key granting access to the closed beta AND the release version. All previous tiers included.

THE GOLDEN MEMBER\r\n============================== Kickstarter Exclusive land set: every land you create in Fa\u00ebria will have an alternate visual.  Kickstarter Exclusive orb: your orb will be marked with detailed ornementations to witness your faith in Fa\u00ebria. At this level, we include you in the credits along with the development team. All previous tiers included.

THE TRINITY ============================== Kickstarter Exclusive card: Trinity Champion (human card), tradable and legal only for unranked play and special events like the Kickstarter tournaments. In addition, you will receive 3 keys granting access to the closed beta and the release version. All previous tiers included, making a total of 5 keys valid for both the beta and the release.

THE CARTOGRAPHER ==============================\r\nPHYSICAL TIER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Kickstarter Exclusive cloth map of the game world, made from premium quality fabric and ink. All previous tiers included.

THE PRECIOUS ============================== PHYSICAL TIER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ A premium quality cardboard and ink version of the Tavaryn Yak, signed by the team. Plus a Kickstarter Exclusive hand made plushie yak. All previous tiers included.

THE SHAPESHIFTER ============================== Kickstarter exclusive alternate cards: You will receive 3 digital copies of 5 alternate-art cards: Ogre Boulder Thrower, Thyrian Colossus, Lunar Mochi, Sunwell and Fortune Hunter. All previous tiers included.

THE AUTHOR ==============================  Rename a card from Fa\u00ebria's collection and receive one digital copy. This card will be tradable and legit in every play format and tournaments. All previous tiers included.

THE LUXURIOUS ============================== PHYSICAL TIER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Send us your decklist (between 40 and 50 cards) and you will receive it in a physical version, made from premium quality cardboard and ink. Each of the 5 devs will pick a card and sign it. Includes THE AUTHOR's rewards.

THE TREASURED ============================== LIMITED EDITION PHYSICAL TIER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nHigh quality large poster exclusive to this kickstarter. Each poster will be numbered by hand and signed by the team, Edition limited to 25, dimensions are 80cmx110cm. Shipping fees included. Includes all previous tiers. Includes THE AUTHOR's rewards.

THE DESIGNER                                                   \r\n============================== \r\nThe team will contact you to discuss your card, it will be your design but it needs to match certain requirements. An illustrator will do a unique art work for your card and thousands of players will use it. All previous tiers included.
THE FARM BOY ==============================  You will receive the original painting of the Farm Boy, made by Jen in 2012. All previous tiers included.

THE GENESIS ============================== You will receive the first card that was ever painted by Jen, Fa\u00ebria's main illustrator. It's truly the first time a card got illustrated and painted for Fa\u00ebria. Here's your chance to acquire a piece of history. Includes THE DESIGNER's rewards.

THE BUDDY ==============================  \r\nThe team invites you to Belgium! You will visit our studio and spend hours with us playing the game and eating chocolates, unless you prefer drinking beer. We'll take the time necessary to design your card. You will be accomodated at the Li\u00e8ge's Crowne Plazza where we will share a meal together. Everything is included except for your trip. Includes THE DESIGNER's rewards.

THE PRIMAL MAKER ============================== You will be the one to press the button which will upload the release version of Fa\u00ebria. This unique moment will be filmed and broadcasted over the Internet. You will be credited right after the team in the credits, mentioned as the "FAERIA PRIMAL MAKER". Includes THE DESIGNER's rewards.
THE TOP NOTCH ============================== Your user name will be 'notch'. Of course we would really prefer you to be the real notch. Includes THE BUDDY's rewards ;-)
